title: Epic: Zero-Leak Compiler
body:
Establish tooling and policy to ensure the Rusholme compiler has zero memory leaks. Zig's manual memory management means every allocation must be paired with a deallocation. This epic sets up the enforcement mechanisms:

1. Research the best leak detection strategy for Zig + C interop
2. Enforce std.testing.allocator usage in all tests
3. Add GPA leak detection to main.zig for debug builds
4. Add Valgrind CI step for C interop (deferred until LLVM backend is active)
5. Document the zero-leak policy

**Key principle:** No PR may be merged if it introduces a memory leak. Tests using std.testing.allocator catch this automatically.

**Sub-tasks:** #107, #108, #109, #110
